channel.title: Doerfel-Verse Music Playlist
channel.description: Music playlist RSS feed created from podcast:remoteItem references in Into The Doerfel-Verse podcast

item.title: Episode 56 - re.podtards.com (Music Playlist)
item.description:
ðŸŽµ Music Playlist Episode

Just two podtards talking about nerdy v4v music stuff and playing some tracks :) check out Chads music player site! https://re.podtards.com/

If you recieve any Value, please consider giving value back in a way that's meaningful to you!

Help produce the DV by helping us with studio gear HERE

Or Donate through Boosting or Paypal HERE

Thanks for traveling Into The Doerfel-Verse! 

www.doerfelverse.com

item.title: Episode 48 - Boo-bury (Music Playlist)
item.description:
ðŸŽµ Music Playlist Episode

Our guest Boo-bury is always at the forfront of intovation taking v4v to the next level! Be sure not to miss his brand new show 

The Satellite Spotlight

It will be livestreamed May 10 starting at 6pm central. Citybeach will be performing at 9PM. Go to www.liveislit.com for more info!

His Podcast can also be found at www.behindthesch3m3s.com

Thanks for traveling Into The Doerfel-Verse!

item.title: Episode 47 - My Friend Jimi (Music Playlist)
item.description:
ðŸŽµ Music Playlist Episode

Today we were joined by My Friend Jimi! We listen to some his songs and get to hear the origin of his musical journey. You can follow him on Instagram.

We've also made a Fountain playlist featuring all of his current songs in the ValueVerse, plus a few songs from soe other v4v artists that you can put on if you want to hear more of his music.

Thanks for traveling Into The Doerfel-Verse!

item.title: Episode 39 - ChadF (Music Playlist)
item.description:
ðŸŽµ Music Playlist Episode

We got the OG EXECUTIVE PRODUCER of the DoerfelVerse himself ChadF to hang! We also have a surpise visit from Shredward and we get a sneak peek of his new upcoming CityBeach album. We chat, listen to some tracks, and talk v4v nerd talk!

90% goes right to the artists when you boost while their song is playing! We would love to hear from you if you enjoy listening! Share the show and give us a shout, we truly value you!

contact me: tj@doerfelverse.com

item.title: Episode 37 - Jukebox Vol. 4 (Music Playlist)
item.description:
ðŸŽµ Music Playlist Episode

Show notes:

*Feeling Bout You - Kurtisdrums

*Playing God - Opus

Who is Opus? I discuss what i know. Then I play clips from the band Vulfpeck, which is who Theo got his career going with, and how they beat the system and spotify. Clips: https://youtu.be/KXvncV79LXk https://youtu.be/T7qf7VTubbI 

*That's The Life - The Katzman

*Grow - The Doerfels

*Let You Down - The Johner Boys 

*Happy New Year - The Doerfels

90% goes right to the artists when you boost while their song is playing! We would love to hear from you if you enjoy listening! Share the show and give us a shout, we love to know if anyone is listening and cares!

contact me: tj@doerfelverse.com

item.title: Episode 36 - Doerfel Jukebox Vol. 3 (Music Playlist)
item.description:
ðŸŽµ Music Playlist Episode

I am joined by a couple of my children, Jdog and Hazel, and we play music from the valueverse!

Track list:

PorkChops Fried - HeyCitizen
Change Your Mind - Ainsley Costello
That Duck - Sir Seat Sitter
Big Sciota - Generation Gap
Sensitive Guy - Miles Fonda
Secrets - Jordan Dedo
Let Go - Middle Season

90% goes right to the artists when you boost while their song is playing!
